short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assistant for viewing the shop small map.  Adds a 'see all shops' button to see shops that are on top of each other.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for the Amex shop small map.

It removes the footer & Covid messages so you can see the "redo search" button.
Adds a 'see all shops' button to see shops that are on top of each other.

If the button doesn't work, refresh the page and try again.
